response:
Right spastic hemiparesis with brisk reflexes and extensor plantar signifies a contralateral UMN lesion. Concurrent ipsilateral complete LMN facial weakness and left eye adduction paresis with abducting nystagmus on right gaze indicate a left MLF/facial fascicle brainstem process. Reduced left visual acuity with left RAPD localises separately to the left optic nerve. The most parsimonious explanation is two lesions.

lesion_locations = ["left pons", "left optic nerve"]
